data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Mahajanga, Madagascar humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mahajanga, Madagascar

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 10,700 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Mahajanga.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Mahajanga, Madagascar.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Yemeni people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Mahajanga. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Mahajanga to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Mahajanga, Madagascar.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
